New Records: Celtics matched NBA-record 29 3-pointers made in the game.
Jayson Tatum scored 37 points and made eight of the Celtics' 29 3-pointers.
Celtics celebrated Banner 18 by making a franchise record of 29 3-pointers.
Key Match Events: Celtics' ability to shoot from the outside was a key factor, especially with 17 three-pointers in the first half.
Jalen Brunson scored 22 points for the Knicks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was held at TD Garden in Boston, MA.
The game had a line of BOS -5.5 and an over/under of 221.5.
